title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 370.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 370.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

There is hereby established a land classification system
pursuant to article 25AA of the Agriculture and Markets Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
370.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
